code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useAuth0}from"@auth0/auth0-react";import{FaGoogle,FaFacebook,FaApple}from"react-icons/fa";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./Login.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const{loginWithPopup,logout,user,isAuthenticated,getAccessTokenSilently}=useAuth0();const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{if(isAuthenticated){navigate("/inicio");}},[isAuthenticated,navigate]);const handlePopupLogin=async connection=>{try{await loginWithPopup({authorizationParams:{connection,scope:"openid profile email"}});const userInfo=await getAccessTokenSilently();if(userInfo){console.log("User info:",userInfo);navigate("/inicio");}else{throw new Error("Failed to retrieve user info");}}catch(error){console.error("Login error:",error);alert("Error logging in.
